preparation.raw_text:
1. Measure 80 g of copper using a digital scale. 
 2. Measure 32 g of selenium. 
 3. Measure 28 g of silicon. 
 4. Measure 24 g of thulium. 
 5. Combine all materials into a clean, dry mixing bowl. 
 6. Use a mortar and pestle to grind the mixture until it is a fine powder. Ensure all components are thoroughly mixed.
